bit2: Bit 2 -> 0: DCC only, 1: DCC and DC
bit4: Bit 4 -> 0: Speed according to CV2, CV5 and CV6, 1: Individual curve according to CV66-CV95
bit5: Bit 5 -> 0: Short address in CV1, 1: Long address in CV17-CV18
bit6: Bit 6 -> Reserved for accessory decoder, 0: 9-bit addressing of the decoder outputs, 1 = 11-bit addressing
chooseYourApp: Choose which application you want to use:
connectionNote: Enter another address and try to connect again.
cv20: Reserved by NMRA for future use
cv26: Reserved by NMRA for future use
cv29Bit1Off: Reverse - Use to run decoder in opposite direction of travel defined by the loco wiring
cv29Bit1On: Forward - Use to run decoder in the normal direction of travel defined by the loco wiring
cv29Bit2Off: Standard 14 speed step control - Use with decoders that will be run on 14 step command stations only
cv29Bit2On: Advanced 28/128 speed step control - Use with decoders that will be run on most modern command stations
cv29Bit3Off: Off - Use when you do not want to run your decoder on Analog layouts
cv29Bit3On: On - Use when you want to run your decoder on DCC layouts and Analog layouts
cv29Bit5Off: Disabled - Use CVs 02, 05, & 06 to set up simple 3 step speed table if desired
cv29Bit5On: Enabled - Use CVs 65-95 to set up 28 step speed table with 256 step resolution
cv29Bit6Off: 2 Digit Addressing - Use CV01 to set the address. On Digitrax throttles the display shows this as AD2.
cv29Bit6On: 4 Digit Addressing - Use CV17 & CV18 to set address. On Digitrax throttles the display shows AD4 and the process is automated.
cvComplexeDescription: On this page you will find automatic calculators to help you program CVs whose value affects several parameters simultaneously.
dashboardDescription: Train configuration panel (Add/configure locos, read/write CVs etc)
emptyAddress: The address must be filled in
emptyField: At least one of these fields must be filled in
homeDescription: The software communicates with an ESP8266 which interfaces to an Arduino MEGA with DCC++ or DCCpp or DCCppS88.
homeNote: Note: You can use all applications at the same time and on several devices at the same time.
homeTitle: DCC train control software in WiFi
label: Label
mergeFactoryValues: Replace factory values with current values
mobileDescription: Mobile and tablet friendly train control panel
name: Name
readGroupOfCvNote: Recommendation: read a maximum of 10 CVs for each request.
toHeavyImage: The selected image is too heavy.
urlNoteDescription: As the memory of esp is very limited, you can choose to store your pictures on another file server or on the Internet. In general, it is preferable to use this option in order to preserve the performance of esp.
urlNoteTitle: Why a url instead of an image?
